### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of boiler (position -13.5, 20.0) and steam engine (position -18.5, 19.5). The boiler is designed to convert water into steam, which is then utilized by the steam engine to generate electricity.

### Copper plate mine at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position -18.0, -49.0) and a furnace (position -18.0, -49.0).

### Offshore pump at position(-11.5, 26.5)
Consists of an offshore pump (position -11.5, 26.5) that extracts water from the sea, which can be used in the boiler for steam generation.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting pipes
- Ensure that the positions of the entities you are trying to connect are within the valid range for pipe connections. Check the coordinates and make sure they are aligned correctly.
- Verify that there are no existing pipes or entities obstructing the connection path.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. Check the surrounding area for existing entities that may block placement.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.
